entities.name: workspace group
entities.description: A group of workspaces that can be managed together.

entities.name: delete method
entities.description: A method used to delete a workspace group instance.

entities.name: force argument
entities.description: An optional argument to forcibly delete a workspace group.

entities.name: SSL certificate
entities.description: A digital certificate that provides authentication for a website and enables an encrypted connection.

entities.name: SingleStore Helios Pricing page
entities.description: A webpage detailing the pricing for different sizes of workspaces offered by SingleStore.

entities.name: disableAutoSuspend
entities.description: An optional parameter that controls the automatic suspension of a workspace.

entities.name: use method
entities.description: A method to interact with a specific database within a connection.

entities.name: DatabaseSchema
entities.description: A generic schema to describe the database and its tables.

entities.name: create method
entities.description: A method to create a database within a connection.

entities.name: query method
entities.description: A method to execute a MySQL query on the database and retrieve the result.

entities.name: RowType
entities.description: A flexible type that can accommodate various column structures in the query result.

relationships.description: A workspace group can be deleted by specifying its ID or by calling the delete method on its instance.
The delete method can be used with the force argument to forcibly delete a workspace group.
An SSL certificate is required to connect to a free tier workspace.
The available size values for a workspace can be referred from the SingleStore Helios Pricing page.
The use method can optionally use a DatabaseSchema to describe the database schema and its tables.
The create method can optionally use a DatabaseSchema to describe the database schema and its tables.
The query method returns the query result as an array of rows, where each row is represented as a RowType.
